code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import logo from"./Logo_1.png";import"./Header.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const[isSticky,setIsSticky]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{if(window.scrollY>0){setIsSticky(true);}else{setIsSticky(false);}};window.addEventListener("scroll",handleScroll);return()=>{window.removeEventListener("scroll",handleScroll);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"header-fill ".concat(isSticky?"sticky":""),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-fill-bar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{itemProp:"image",src:logo,alt:"Logo"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav-div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"nav-options",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"selected",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/about",children:"About Us"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"selected",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/contact",children:"Contact Us"})})]})})})]})});};export default Header;
